fields.summary: Performance overhead in Client.java due to Increased threads creation
fields.description:
In client.java before HADOOP-18324 , rpc connection class used newCachedThreadPool, which reuses previously constructed threads if they are available else create new. 

In the HADOOP-18324, This has been modified to create new single thread every time and threads will not be reused for other tasks once it completes its execution.

Because of this change, there is overhead in the total number threads created over the lifespan of a client jvm, for example a Hive Metastore. This overhead leads to slight performance latency in our applications.
